p.k: Guiana, France on the far side of the world
p.d: The only European territory to have a land border with the Latin American countries, French Guiana is a little corner of paradise at the gateway to Amazonia. A mosaic of peoples and cultures, Guiana shelters an inestimable natural heritage with 95% of the territory covered by virgin tropical rainforest... Presented by: Sophie Jovillard.
